changes.rationale: Creates a clearer narrative flow (what it is → why it matters → how it works → how you sta...

issues.description: Hero CTA placement may not be visible above fold on mobile devices with stacked layout
issues.rationale: Primary conversion point could be buried below hero content, killing immediate action

issues.description: Pricing moved higher without risk reversal messaging creates purchase anxiety
issues.rationale: Early pricing exposure without trust-building context increases abandonment risk

issues.description: Proof bar with only 3-5 items lacks density for immediate credibility establishment
issues.rationale: Insufficient social proof volume fails to overcome initial skepticism in 8-second window

issues.description: Two-column problem/solution layout may create scanning confusion on desktop
issues.rationale: Side-by-side layout forces eye movement pattern that slows comprehension vs linear flow

issues.description: Visibility panel UI motif lacks clear interaction affordances and purpose
issues.rationale: Ambiguous UI element creates cognitive load without clear value proposition

issues.description: Pricing cards with 5-7 features create comparison fatigue and decision paralysis
issues.rationale: Too many comparison points slow decision-making and increase cognitive burden

issues.description: 65ch line length may be too wide for comfortable scanning on large desktop screens
issues.rationale: Optimal scanning requires shorter line lengths for quick comprehension

issues.description: 16px button padding may create insufficient tap targets for mobile users
issues.rationale: Small touch targets increase interaction friction and accessibility issues

issues.description: 3-card desktop layout forces horizontal scrolling on smaller laptop screens
issues.rationale: Fixed 3-column grid breaks responsive behavior below standard desktop widths

issues.description: Proof chips positioning below hero delays trust signals until after value prop
issues.rationale: Trust elements should precede or accompany value claims for maximum impact

suggestedFixes.fix: Add sticky CTA at 48px height with primary action, visible at all breakpoints below 768px
suggestedFixes.rationale: Ensures conversion opportunity remains accessible during mobile scroll

suggestedFixes.fix: Add risk reversal messaging above pricing cards: '30-day money back' with 24px spacing
suggestedFixes.rationale: Reduces purchase anxiety by addressing refund concerns before price exposure

suggestedFixes.fix: Expand to 7-9 proof items in horizontal scroll on mobile, grid layout on desktop
suggestedFixes.rationale: Increases credibility density while maintaining mobile usability

suggestedFixes.fix: Use single-column layout with problem/solution cards stacked vertically, 32px gap
suggestedFixes.rationale: Maintains natural reading flow while preserving before/after comparison

suggestedFixes.fix: Convert to expandable audit log preview with 'View Details' CTA and timestamp examples
suggestedFixes.rationale: Provides clear interaction model and demonstrates transparency value

suggestedFixes.fix: Limit to 3 key features per card with 'See all features' expandable section
suggestedFixes.rationale: Reduces decision complexity while maintaining feature transparency

suggestedFixes.fix: Set max line length to 55ch for body text with 1.6 line height for improved scanning
suggestedFixes.rationale: Optimizes reading speed and comprehension for web content

suggestedFixes.fix: Increase primary button padding to 20px vertical, 32px horizontal for 44px min touch target
suggestedFixes.rationale: Meets accessibility guidelines and improves mobile interaction success

suggestedFixes.fix: Use CSS grid with minmax(320px, 1fr) for responsive 1-3 column layout based on viewport
suggestedFixes.rationale: Maintains optimal card width across all screen sizes without horizontal scroll

suggestedFixes.fix: Move proof chips inline with hero headline as prefix badges with 12px spacing
suggestedFixes.rationale: Establishes credibility immediately with value proposition for maximum impact
